name: Quadrangular (quadrilateral) space
text: Quadrangular (quadrilateral) space. Borders: superior = lower border of teres minor; inferior = upper border of teres major; medial = long head of triceps; lateral = surgical neck of humerus. Contents: axillary nerve and posterior humeral circumflex artery. Clinical: posterior shoulder approach/deltoid split; risk to axillary nerve.

name: Triangular space
text: Triangular space. Borders: superior = lower border of teres minor; inferior = upper border of teres major; lateral = long head of triceps. Contents: circumflex scapular artery. Clinical: landmark in posterior scapular/axillary anatomy; artery can be involved in scapular anastomoses.

name: Triangular interval
text: Triangular interval. Borders: superior = lower border of teres major; medial = long head of triceps; lateral = shaft of humerus. Contents: radial nerve and profunda brachii artery. Clinical: risk zone in posterior humerus approaches; associated with radial nerve palsy in humeral shaft fractures.
